titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2466) making appropriations for the Department of the Interior and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2000, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-228, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2466 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments. The amendment printed in H. Rept. 106-228 may be offered only by a member designated in the report, shall not be subject to amendment. All points of order against the amendment are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 84.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 243.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/12/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 2466 (Department of the Interior and related agencies appropriations).
